alert.note: Alert for Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Walker and north central Jefferson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lynns Park, or near Cordova, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Sipsey, Rocky Hollow, Burnwell, Beloit, Quinton, Lynns Park, Sayre, Barney, Empire, Powellville, Boldo and Partridge Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
